roleset.name: moderate

role.descr: thing that would be extreme otherwise

example.name: passive
example.text: We note that in Rome yesterday Defense Secretary Cheney said that [European euphoria over Mr. Gorbachev]-1 is starting *trace*-1 to be tempered *trace*-1 by a recognition of `` the magnitude of the problems he was trying to deal with . ''

propbank.arg: by a recognition of `` the magnitude of the problems he was trying to deal with

roleset.note: TEMPER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'temper' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from temper.01-v predicate notes)
